sentence: If you really want to back the blue, obey the law.? The biggest primary threat to Mr. Cawthorn may come from a state senator, Chuck Edwards, who has the endorsements of most members of the state legislature in the district.
title: House Republicans Tire of Madison Cawthorn's Antics. Some in His District Have, Too.

sentence: He's a little bit of a different commodity that probably does not have as strong a base outside the beltway than some of those other members.? Republican Sen. Thom Tillis of North Carolina has formally endorsed a primary challenger, state Sen. Chuck Edwards, in the wake of Cawthorn's latest comments.
title: Rep. Cawthorn's sordid tales of life in Congress frustrate GOP leadership
